Revere.Highland School (Winthrop, Massachusetts: The Highland School, also the Arthur W. Dalrymple School, is a historic school building at 36 Grovers Avenue in Winthrop, Massachusetts. The Georgian Revival two story brick building was built in 1920-21 to replace a nearby school that burned down in 1920. It was built on the site of the Leighton Resort, a popular summer destination.
